Package moteur

Interface Visitor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arbitre
    public interface Visitor
    The interface Visitor is the implementation of the Design Pattern "Visitor", this D.P. allows adding new features, new methodes to existing class structure without need of many changes of the codes, by simply adding differnt strategy to "visit" and a new "visitor". An interface Visitor here connects 2 independante classes : Visitor and GameController, the former one can traverse the cards Jest of each players, in ordre to get the values of the cards, so as to get the biggest/smallest one, or judge if certain players meet the need of the "trophies". The latter one is the core of the game , it generates the cards, configurates the game environment, decides who should be the winner, so it calls often the Visitor.checkJest(Player player), ask (or to say accept) the Visitor to reach its information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int checkJest​(Player player)
      checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.

    • Method Detail

      • checkJest

        int checkJest​(Player player)
        checkJest(Player player) is used to calcul total points of a jest, particularly, of certain players.
        Parameters:
        player - is an instance of a Player, whatever a real player or a virtual one.
        Returns:
        type of an integer, which is the total points of the jest of the player which we indicated as a parameter
